participant_1.background:
I check in with my pup.
I return from the country, and my gym workout helps me get back into the rhythm of my city life.
i sing many songs.
i am a senior in high school.
I want to be in good shape for my cosplay at Comic Con, so I try to exercise every day.

I am an engineer who sings in my spare time.
I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade.
I finally got up the courage to try a new exercise class and really enjoyed it!
I try, but my wife is the real chef in the family.
I stayed home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, for my birthday.

content.text: It's been a great day so far! I finally got up the courage to try a new exercise class and I really enjoyed it.
That's awesome! What kind of exercise class was it?
It was a barre class. I've always been curious about it but was always too nervous to try it. But today I finally went for it and I'm glad I did!
I'm glad you enjoyed it! I've always wanted to try a barre class too. Maybe I'll give it a try sometime soon.
You should! It's a really great workout.
What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out at home. I'm a senior in high school and I have a big test tomorrow, so I'm trying to relax and study a little bit.
Oh, good luck on your test!
I'm taking AP English and we're reading a book called "The Great Gatsby."
Oh, I've read that book! It's a great book.
I know, right? It's so good!
I'm sure you'll do great on your test!
